totalcross.res

Class TristateImage

  • totalcross.lang.Object
    • totalcross.res.TristateImage

  • public class TristateImage
extends totalcross.lang.Object
    An image that has three states: normal, pressed and disabled. Used in the Android user interface style.
    Since:
    TotalCross 1.3
